title: Government Approves Eleven (11) Proposals of Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) Amounting to Rs. 1,567.91 Crore ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Finance of the Republic of India ) Based on the recommendations of Foreign Investment Promotion Board (FIPB) in its meeting held on 11th September 2015 , Government has approved 11 (eleven) proposals of Foreign Direct
